channel.title: NpcDrops
channel.description: Right I don't know whether this is a problem but i added my drops to .Tsm and .Cfg file's now I went into NpcConstants and added 995(Coin) I compiled it, But when i kill the monster it drops the 1 coin but it doesn't drop any of the item's in .Tsm and .Cfg and the drop ratio is 1 because I was doing it as a tester.
